unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Shipment of Lightbulbs
question_text: After a large shipment of lightbulbs goes out, the manufacturer estimates that about $1\%$ are defective. What is the probability that in a package of $10\text{ lightbulbs}$ , at most $1\text{ lightbulb}$ is defective?
